message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $8,000.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I'm confident you'll find it's a worthwhile investment at that price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $17,000 is still too high for my budget.  Could you consider $10,000?
